pysegcnn.core.layers.ConvBnReluUpsample¶

class pysegcnn.core.layers.ConvBnReluUpsample(in_channels, out_channels, **kwargs)[source]¶

Block of convolution, batchnorm, relu and nearest neighbor upsample.

__init__(in_channels, out_channels, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initialize.

Parameters
in_channelsint

Number of input channels.

out_channelsint

Number of output channels.

**kwargs: `dict` [`str`]

Additional arguments passed to pysegcnn.core.layers.Conv2dSame.

Raises
TypeError

Raised if layers() method does not return an instance of torch.nn.Sequential.
